title: Left swipe delete behavior changed worse in V.13
creator: whitedavidp
content:
In V.10, it used to be I had to really swipe all the way left for delete to occur.

Now in V.13 only a small/partial movement deletes.

This is tool easy to mis-trigger. Please go back.

Thanks

title: Local folders disapear
creator: abuole
content: Hi I have a 100% standard installation of Thunderbird I usw a lot of local folders where I keep some mails. Suddenly all my folders disapeared. I had removed thunderbird and installed it again and suddenly the folders apeared again But next day when I started thunderbird the had disapeared again. What shall i do, it will be very tiring to delete and install thunderbird everey time I use it Regards Ole

title: Deleted email
creator: tony.muehlebach
content: How can I restore an email that I have deleted but want it to reactivate? Thanks and kind regards Tony
